description: Everything works, install it and open Dolphin and go to Network, pin it on right click - Add to Places

Unfotunately as useful as this app would be, it has yet be to verified by Google by the developer. Uncertain if this is on the developer''s end or Google end but whichever it is; is preventing log-on to the app due to this fact. 

Until the app gets verified by Google for Sign-in it will remain effectively useless due to the lack of ability to sign into the app or link your Google account.
Unfortunately the authentication procedure shows blank after doing 2 factor auth. The it gets stuck

Went to Network in Dolphin and found the new Google Drive. Had to right-clik on authentication page and do a 'Reload' for it to display but after that authentication worked and able to use my GDrive on the desktop. Awesome!
Does not work, it fails to launch.
I would love to use it, Just what I need unfortunately login is buggy

All you get when trying to install this is an error message from google that the app is blocked. This version is an older version of KIO GDrive, this needs to be updated in the repositories to the current stable version 1.3.0. Its also BS that i'm not allowed to rate this lower than a 2 star rating. When trying to rate at a 1 star, something that is non functional, the submit review button becomes inoperable.
summary: Needs to be updated to the latest stabke version

description:
Just installed on Kubuntu 20.04 LTS and I have reasonably fast access to my Google Drive.
It is simple, just Install, go to Network in Dolphin, click on Google Drive and follow the authentication process. You may need to right click > reload if you get a blank screen in the process.
Everything is working perfectly, if you get stuck on web authentification, just wait for a minute, it will works!
This has been broken for a while now. When trying to add "Google Accounts" it just loops back and fails.

There was a bug which has been fixed on the
development version. If it hasn't been fixed on 
the main version already, it will be soon.
Doesn't work at all in Kubuntu 20.04.
Don't work on kubuntu 20.04
Does enybody have any suggestion?

Just installed on kubuntu 20.04

In dolphin click Add place and use link like gdrive://yourname@gmail.com (it's from the manual)

If you have a blank window on login just refresh it.
stuck on blank web authentication for google
como se usa? 0 documentacion.. sin cliente grafico o algo para cargar... basicamente es ocupar espacio en disco.

Al seleccionar la cuenta que quiero sincronizar me dice que:

Por el momento, el acceso a Google no está disponble para esta app
Google todavía no verifica esta app para que sea compatible con "Acceso con Google"
NOTA: No me deja enviar el comentario si califico con una estrella
Trabajo con Fedora 32, aparece el ícono en sitios de red pero al iniciar la conexión solo llega hasta "Añadir cuenta" de allí no pasa

Para poder configurarlo hay que descargar (lógicamente) este complemento, reiniciar, ir a preferencias del sistema, cuentas con conexión, iniciar sesión en google, entrar en el apartado de la cuenta para verificar la casilla de drive y ya estará disponible en dolphin, en el apartado de red. Pudes fijar la carpeta para aparecer en remotos.
Para los que dicen que no funciona, si funciona. Simplemente instalen y vayan a la carpeta de Red, ahi van a encontrar el ícono para acceder a la cuenta de Google y listo!
Excelente aplicación, integra perfectamente mis cuentas de google drive en dolphin sin tener que ocupar espacio en mi disco, muy recomendada para usuarios KDE
Excelente, solo se instala y luego en Dolphin buscas >> RED >> GDrive, agregas la cuenta y ya!

L'intégration à Dolphin fonctionne très bien. On retrouve Gdrive dans réseau et après configuration tous les fichiers sont accessibles.
Bravo !
